content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #280

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 74

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Providing FHIR Resources to a CDS Service
Section:
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

However, CDS Services must respond quickly (on the order of 500 ms.), and so we provide performance enhancements that allow a CDS Service to request and obtain FHIR resources more efficiently.

Proposed Wording:

However, CDS Services must respond quickly (on the order of 500 ms.), and so this specification provides performance enhancements that allow a CDS Service to request and obtain FHIR resources more efficiently.

Comment:
Avoid use of the pronoun "we" to discuss features of the specification.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #280

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Providing FHIR Resources to a CDS Service
Section:

In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

However, CDS Services must respond quickly (on the order of 500 ms.), and so we provide performance enhancements that allow a CDS Service to request and obtain FHIR resources more efficiently.

Proposed Wording:

However, CDS Services must respond quickly (on the order of 500 ms.), and so this specification provides performance enhancements that allow a CDS Service to request and obtain FHIR resources more efficiently.

Comment:

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #280

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Will update as suggested

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #280

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment:
Will update as suggested

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
